name: Re-re-reborn
description:
Hey everyone,

We are a small team working on our game (currently in prototype stage, Windows build), would be cool if you could give it a try and give us some feedback :)

The game is about a character who keeps getting his parts disconnected from them. Your goal is to find and pick up missing character parts.  Parts can be picked up in any order. 

You can zoom out a bit to have a better view at the level.

Prototype only supports mouse and keyboard input at the moment.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated, and the best way to provide feedback is to fill the survey:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeE1OpxQxQXhJVogxXeUWG8OO7_Pkp7BZcW1Vlgpbhblh-WpQ/viewform?usp=sf_link
